what.q: What vehicles are available for rent?
what.a: We offer premium jet skis, ATVs (all-terrain vehicles), and UTVs (side-by-side vehicles). Each vehicle is maintained to the highest standards and suitable for different experience levels.

age.a: You must be at least 16 years old with valid identification. Parental consent is required for those under 18. Driver's license is required for ATVs and UTVs.

book.q: How do I book a rental?
book.a: You can book online through our website or contact us directly. We recommend booking in advance, especially during peak season.

safety.q: What safety measures are in place?
safety.a: We provide all necessary safety equipment including helmets and life jackets. Safety briefing is mandatory before each rental. Our vehicles are regularly maintained and GPS tracked.

cancel.a: We offer a 24-hour cancellation policy. Cancellations due to bad weather receive a full refund.

duration.q: How long can I rent for?
duration.a: We offer flexible rental periods starting from 1 hour. Half-day and full-day packages are also available with discounted rates.
